message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I'm looking to keep my expenses lower. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $14000?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer the product to you for $13500. What do you think?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $13000.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm getting closer to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I can offer the product to you for $12800. What do you think?
